website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Pro Bounce 2018 Low is a great and affordable performance shoe based on consumer feedback and sneaker reviews. This low-top basketball shoe surely has it all: a good price, highly effective Bounce in its midsole, awesome traction, and a breathable upper. They are also aesthetically appealing.
pros: Many reviewers say that the Bounce technology in the midsole effectively protects their legs and knees from stress and fatigue
A couple of testers made the Adidas Pro Bounce 2018 Low a part of their rotation
Once broken in, the rubber outsole seems to stop collecting so much dust
Several users are happy with the design of these Adidas basketball shoes
They claim that they are aesthetically appealing both on and off court
Many buyers are pleased that the Pro Bounce Low is light
The outriggers on both sides of the shoe deliver stability upon landing, claim most testers
A good number of reviewers notice that the Adidas Pro Bounce 2018 Low is versatile
They say that heavy and light players will enjoy playing in these low-top basketball shoes
cons: According to a handful of testers, the tongue of the Adidas Pro Bounce Low is not really secure and moves to the side during play
Some users claim that these Adidas shoes do not have enough support

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been having issues with my Achilles and calf when I play basketball. My doctor recommended that I change my shoes more often. So, I bought these shoes. They are super comfortable., fit well even with my ankle braces on, and most importantly I was able to play basketball pain free yesterday. Just one thing about the color. They say blue/ grey. It is not grey. It is teal. I almost sent them back when I saw it was teal and not grey. But when I put them on and they were so comfortable I didn’t care about the teal.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rea

customer_reviews.title: Exellecnt for outdoor courts
customer_reviews.text: I'm over sixty and I play basketball three to four times a week (an hour each time) as my way to exercise. I play on outside basketball courts and have searched for shoes that would last, be comfortable and look good (lol) This shoe fits the bill. I wore Adidas in high school (back in the day) and today's shoe is EXCELLENT! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grip
customer_reviews.text: In the first wearing of the shoe I played on a court that is always dirty. These things gripped like superglue. I didn’t wipe the soles off once in an hour of play. Also a lot of people have commented that they had to go down half a size. Mine fit the same as my other Adidas. However, after some more rugged playtime, I can see how they might get loose.
customer_reviews.author: Nyla

customer_reviews.title: Shoe did not match on-line photo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sizes of the same shoe because we didn't know which would fit. They both arrived on the same day, but from different sellers through Amazon. The on-line descriptions and photos of both shoes were exactly the same, but when we opened the boxes, they were not the same shoes. They were VERY similar, but they were not the same shoes. (see photos)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Washkoviak

customer_reviews.title: I love 'em! Their great!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and I like how I am able to jump in them. I am not a great basketball player or not even a good basketball player but with these shoes, I enjoy playing some b-ball.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew in Memphis

customer_reviews.title: Adidas shoe lace design is flawed
customer_reviews.text: The overall rating is intentionally lower for average scores to pick it up. Overall shoe is stable, and good for basketball, but it annoys me that I have to keep replacing shoe laces due to flawed design. This is really Adidas issue. This is my second pair of Adidas shoes where shoe lace failed within weeks of usage. The key reason is that the holders of the shoe laces are too narrow and they cut into the laces and within weeks the laces fall apart. The last one not only the shoe lace failed, but also the holes that hold the shoe lace ripped. The shoe becomes useless then. I'll put a separate review of that.
customer_reviews.author: jedi

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these shows for volleyball, and they are amazing! The cushioning inside is great, a bit much but very comfortable. I used them on two different types of courts and I can’t complain AT ALL. Feels really light when I jump or ran after a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out
customer_reviews.text: Had hoped this might be an option for my son. These are a better looking shoe in the photos than in real life. The tongue box is huge. Just did not look great or have much ankle support compared to the UA lows we ended up sticking with. Great Value though. Not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable shoes with good cushioning-excellent at this price point. Only complaint is that tongue is oddly long and lacks any side to side anchoring which allows it to shift far to the side when running.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and stylish. The new 2019 versions aren’t as nice looking. I have 3 pairs because they fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RyeBread

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but runs a little big. Bought 1/2 a size smaller than his Nike shoes.
customer_reviews.author: S Bohman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit from size chart men's to women's
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a 7.5 for my daughter who wears an 8.5 in women's and they are a perfect fit. She loves them on the court!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great pair for indoor sports
customer_reviews.text: For the price they're very good he does a lot of grip. That's what I like about the shoes you won't slip
customer_reviews.author: Marco R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them and okays basketball in them all of the time. They’re holding up well and he says they’re comfy
customer_reviews.author: Monica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and colorful
customer_reviews.text: The best part is the style-green with orange . Somehow those two colors mesh very well. Originally the fit was a bit tight on the toe section but after a week the fit was better. Overall, a nice pair that got many complements.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Golden

customer_reviews.title: Love the team colors and logo... Goes well with my team gear...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit with great look and feel. As usual, Adidas fit snugger than usual, so I suggest if your not familiar with Adidas shoes, get a full size larger than normal...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've used this shoes for a few basketball games at the gym and on the street and these shoes are excellent. They have great support, weight, and grip where I can make cuts really well. I recommend others to give these shoes a try.
customer_reviews.author: H.M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Adidas basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are the shoes my son had to have for his basketball team. They are great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you wear Adidas shoes often they may be right.
customer_reviews.text: Adidas sneakers never fit perfect. 11.5 to small at toe 12 is to big but they fit better than11.5
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Differents colors and style
customer_reviews.text: I like this item because the colors and design are spectacular. Woooooooow.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Trenal

customer_reviews.title: Available
customer_reviews.text: Price was a little high but seems to be official.
customer_reviews.author: Hector L.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’ 260lbs. Not the tallest guy. But I am heavy. And these shoes provide solid support. I suffered ligament damage with my Nike Infuriates after years of use, so I needed new shoes. These do the trick. Solid support and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Attraction is good; cushion also ok.
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is a bit big and doesn't stand long in the same position. It could have more shoe laces' holes, so the feet doesn't go anywhere during the game. Also the ventilation isn't the best; feet can get hot easily
customer_reviews.author: Catarina

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, 14 yo has been wearing for a while and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: MANY COMPLIMENTS
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten many compliments on my shoes....I am really hoping that the others I am expecting to be emailed on come in soon!
customer_reviews.author: Bert O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son, 13 loves these. Very comfy. Going to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Performs
customer_reviews.text: Adidas Men's Pro Bounce 2018 is the best fit trainers I have. They support my feet in the areas I need. This prolongs my use each day without worry. Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe...loose fit
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, but they fit loosely. Playing sport, they offered no ankle support. I use them for casual wear and not for fitness.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe....played outdoor in them today, lite with good traction. Only wish I had gotten in wide.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality with Velcro strap
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro strap fell off before even one use. Not sure if the quality is low or we just got a defective shoe. Either way, it’s disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made shoe. Light But narrow through the ball and toe box. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: GLC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size - seems to be a consistent problem
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks awesome and I literally cannot wait to try it. Unfortunately, I was sent a size 7.5 despite buying a size 9.5 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Stratemeier

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, wasn't disappointed. Good hold on the ankle, great grip. My only concern would be the durability of the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Animizice

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Originals are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the brand pretty much, and the colors and model are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor sports.
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable shoes, light, and easy to move in. My only concern is the little strings holding the laces, I’ve had these kind of laces before and they are prone to rip. So far no issues with this current shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Syrnichenko

customer_reviews.title: Wider sole footprint and footbed works well with insoles/orthotics
customer_reviews.text: Son Said these were great after returning others with narrower sole width. More of a supportive cross-training feel.
customer_reviews.author: D123

customer_reviews.title: VERY Comfortable-I have four pair!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I actually have them in FOUR colors, they fit so well and are an excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Finney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome feel
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and cushion. Very gripping sole for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Doss

customer_reviews.title: Well if they're good enough for Spida Mitchell...
customer_reviews.text: It's rare when you can buy kicks that several college and NBA players wear for $70, so I can see why they're so popular. Comfortable, great fit, durable, good traction, and might be one of the best looking basketball shoes Adidas has put out in awhile. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this shoe type agian
customer_reviews.text: Finally a show that doesn’t fall apart right away with a boys wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who was having ankle trouble with his Hardin 2. He has every other shoe. Nike hyperdunk, Kobe, lebron etc. also all of the adidas. These and the new hyperdunk are his favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked and felt great but was a tad small for me. I am usually a 14 and needed to return which was handled very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sunmaster

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got half size bigger...fits nice...good for hoops or just for leisure...have been wearing for a month now...no issues so far...
customer_reviews.author: joseph dokla

customer_reviews.title: Heel area has too much space!
customer_reviews.text: The heel has lift unless you tie the laces really tight. Even after tying the heel area has too much space. Other than that the shoe has good support.
customer_reviews.author: TK6699

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball/volleyball
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as new volleyball shoes and they’re really comfortable. The shoes have great traction on the court and are surprisingly lighter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Makaleb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish. Pictures didn’t do them justice. Liked them even more after receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen Kuemmel

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for my basketball player! Great price compared to an in store buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: The snug fit was great... Good for lateral and sudden stop movements. Great shoes for basketball if you are playing position 1 and 2
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I have ever purchased!!
customer_reviews.text: Team Shoe... wore It for the Arizona State vs. Arizona Football game in Tempe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable supportive basketball shoe. Traction was good. Bounce is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for price
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. The sole is great. Really made a difference with cuts and support
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Very confortable, protects my ankles and fits perfectly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: non slip athletic sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. used it for racquetball held court very well. One of the best sneakers I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little narrow in the middle of your foot. Goes normal through time
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to really say you will be envied by everyone after you cop these babies!
customer_reviews.author: On Time Transportation and Mobility Services

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, good arch support
customer_reviews.text: The low cut would work well for a guard bending feet a lot. What's different about this pair compared with other Explosive Adidas is that there's more cushioning support on the bottom. It can be helpful for me playing more outdoor courts with hard bottom: I've been getting knee pains all the time. The downside is that the feet feel a little fatigue walking in them because of the bottom structure. A big plus is that it's simplistic. I can wear them not necessarily when playing ball as well.
customer_reviews.author: Walden

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Pro Bounce 2018 Low Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Made for the agile, all-around player, these low-cut shoes are designed to keep you light on your feet for quick movement on both ends of the court. Built to change directions and accelerate past defenders, they feature a padded collar and flexible cushioning to let you log big minutes in comfort.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper; Forgefiber in the upper features heat-pressed, TPU-coated fibers that are stitched in to provide targeted support and lightweight durability
Cable lacing system with webbing eyelets; Geofit construction for anatomical fit and comfort
TPU shank and midfoot propulsion plate provide optimal on-court support; Bounce cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility
